abstract: Puppies that have appeared in play The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time over course of its two-year Broadway run have all been adopted by cast and crew members as they aged out of role.

keywords.value: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time (Play)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: “The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time” is closing its Broadway run, but there is life after acting for the 21 puppies who have appeared in the show.
snippet: “The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time” is closing its Broadway run, but there is life after acting for the 21 puppies who have appeared in the show....

headline.main: For the Scene Stealers of ‘The Curious Incident,’ a Happy Second Act, in Dog Years
headline.print_headline: For a Breed of Actors, a Second Act Offstage
